name: Oh no! Gojira!
description:
To play, click the  game window and use the arrow keys or ASDW to navigate. 

Interacting with objects will trigger small lines of dialogue.

I just recently learned about Bitsy after being introduced by a friend and I'm having so much fun with it. Did this in a span of 2 hours is just a small random game where I try to use various features of Bitsy.
